summary: A supercentenarian is someone who has lived to the age of 110 years or more, something achieved by only one in a thousand centenarians.
full_text: A supercentenarian  is someone who has lived to or passed their 110th birthday. This age is achieved by about one in 1,000 centenarians. Anderson et al. concluded that supercentenarians live a life typically free of major age-related diseases until shortly before maximum human lifespan is reached between 110 and 115 years.
title: Supercentenarian
